TopicTitle: dv readout per stage easily confused in VAB when editing stages

Articles.Content:
KSP2 0.1.0.0.20892   -   Windows 10 Home 21H2   -   Ryzen 9 3950X   -   RTX 2080 Ti (Driver 528.49)

Problem shows even with minimal rocket build (one stage). Adding and removing stages, as well as moving the engine between stages confuses the readouts.
Saving and reloading the rocket fixes this.
